closeOnSelect.description: Whether the menu should be closed when the option is selected.

disabled.description: Whether the menu item is disabled

valueText.description:
The textual value of the option. Used in typeahead navigation of the menu.
If not provided, the text content of the menu item will be used.

id.description: The `id` of the element that provides accessibility label to the option group

value.description: The unique value of the menu item option.

closeOnSelect.description: Whether the menu should be closed when the option is selected.

disabled.description: Whether the menu item is disabled

valueText.description:
The textual value of the option. Used in typeahead navigation of the menu.
If not provided, the text content of the menu item will be used.

closeOnSelect.description: Whether the menu should be closed when the option is selected.

disabled.description: Whether the menu item is disabled

valueText.description:
The textual value of the option. Used in typeahead navigation of the menu.
If not provided, the text content of the menu item will be used.

escapeKeyDown.description: Function called when the escape key is pressed

focusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component

highlightChange.description: Function called when the highlighted menu item changes.

interactOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component

openChange.description: Function called when the menu opens or closes

pointerDownOutside.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component

select.description: Function called when a menu item is selected.

update:open.description: Function called when the menu is opened or closed.

anchorPoint.description: The positioning point for the menu. Can be set by the context menu trigger or the button trigger.

aria-label.description: The accessibility label for the menu

closeOnSelect.description: Whether to close the menu when an option is selected

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the menu when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.

highlightedValue.description: The value of the highlighted menu item.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  trigger: string
  contextTrigger: string
  content: string
  label(id: string): string
  group(id: string): string
  positioner: string
  arrow: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the menu. Useful for composition.

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop the keyboard navigation.

positioning.description: The options used to dynamically position the menu

typeahead.description: Whether the pressing printable characters should trigger typeahead navigation
